trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gyűjteményét tartalmazza <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> has a StylusPointCollection that contains <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects collected from a stylus and digitizer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>rendelkezik, amely tartalmazza a StylusPointCollection <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objektumok gyűjtött a stylus és digitalizáló.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: You can use the StylusPointCollection to customize the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: A styluspointcollection elem kinyeréséhez segítségével testre szabhatja a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> és a megadott osztály <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Általános IEnumerable típusú <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> hozzáadása a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: stylusPointsis .

trans-unit.target: A hossza points 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The objects in stylusPoints have incompatible objects.
trans-unit.target: – vagy – a objektumokat stylusPoints rendelkezik nem kompatibilis objektumok.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class with specified points.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> a megadott pont osztályt.

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Általános IEnumerable típusú <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> , amely megadja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumok hozzáadása a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: points is .
trans-unit.target: pointsis .

trans-unit.source: The length of points is 0.
trans-unit.target: A hossza points 0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that may initially contain the specified number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> osztály, amely kezdetben előfordulhat, hogy tartalmazza a megadott számú <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: When you use the StylusPointCollection constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, you specify it's `initialCapacity`.
trans-unit.target: Használatakor a styluspointcollection elem kinyeréséhez konstruktor hozzon létre egy új <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, megadhatja, hogy rendelkezik `initialCapacity`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, you can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Azonban hozzáadhat további <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objektumok meghívásával a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> can initially contain.
trans-unit.target: Hány <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumok a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> kezdetben tartalmazhat.

trans-unit.source: initialCapacity is negative.
trans-unit.target: initialCapacitya rendszer negatív.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that contains the properties specified in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> osztályt, amely tartalmazza a megadott tulajdonságok a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects added to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that is compatible with `stylusPointDescription`.
trans-unit.target: Minden <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>hozzáadott objektumok a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>rendelkeznie kell egy <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>Ez kompatibilis `stylusPointDescription`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> , amely megadja, hogy a tárolt további tulajdonságokat <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stylusPointDescription is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointDescriptionis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that is the specified size and contains the properties specified in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> osztály, amely a megadott méretet, és tartalmazza a megadott tulajdonságok a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> is created with the capacity to hold the specified number of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor hozzon létre egy új <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>hozza létre a kapacitás ahhoz, hogy a megadott számú <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objektumok.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects than `initialCapacity` by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hozzáadhat további <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>mint objektumokat `initialCapacity` meghívásával a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> , amely megadja, hogy a tárolt további tulajdonságokat <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> can initially contain.
trans-unit.target: Hány <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumok a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> kezdetben tartalmazhat.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains copies of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects in the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> másolatait tartalmazza, amely a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumok az aktuális <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> , amely társítva van a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumokat a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> , amely társítva van a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumokat a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: A meghatározott beszúr <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> azokat a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> a megadott pozíciónál található.

trans-unit.target: Szúrja be a pozíciót a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: indexnagyobb vagy egyenlő számú objektumokat a .

trans-unit.target: Kiváltja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Changed"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.EventArgs>, amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Finds the intersection of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*> property.
trans-unit.target: A megadott metszetének megkeresése <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> és a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*>

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> which describes a subset of values belonging to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`van egy <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>amely ismerteti, hogy egy részhalmazát tartozó értékek a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that intersects the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> of the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>módszer segítségével <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>, amely az <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>aktuális <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> metszi</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Reformat method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects as those belonging to the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A újraformázza metódus adja vissza <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, amely tartalmazza az ugyanazon <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>az aktuális <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> tartozó objektumokat</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> uses `subsetToReformatTo` as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>az új objektumok <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>használja `subsetToReformatTo` <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Reformat uses the constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Újraformázza a megkötéseket használ a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>tulajdonság, még akkor is, ha a korlátozások `subsetToReformatTo` különbözőek.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses the values 0 and 1023 for <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> whereas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> uses the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Például ha `subsetToReformatTo` használ az értékek 0 és 1023 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>mivel <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>használ az értékek 0 és 255.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>

trans-unit.source: Reformat returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> using the values, 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Formázza újra értéket ad vissza egy <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>a következő értékek 0 és 255.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> ütközik az, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> az aktuális <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that has a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> uses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> , amely rendelkezik egy <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> , amely egy részét a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> és a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> , amely az aktuális <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> használja.

trans-unit.source: subsetToReformatTo is not a subset of the property.
trans-unit.target: subsetToReformatTonincs egy részét a tulajdonság.

trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> az adott helyén a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> is connected to a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> and there is only one <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> csatlakozik egy <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> és csak egy <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> a a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Beállítja a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> a megadott pozíciónál található.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> to set at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> beállítása a megadott pozíciónál található.

trans-unit.source: The of stylusPoint is not compatible with the property.
trans-unit.target: A a stylusPoint inkompatibilis a tulajdonság.

trans-unit.source: Converts the property values of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects into a 32-bit signed integer array.

trans-unit.source: Converts the property values of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects into a 32-bit signed integer array.
trans-unit.target: A tulajdonság értékének alakítja át a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objektumok egy 32 bites előjeles egész számokat tömbbe.
